newsitem.title: MEXICO: Apasco Q2 net profit 106 mln pesos.
newsitem.headline: Apasco Q2 net profit 106 mln pesos.

text.p: Mexican cement maker Apaso SA de CV said on Thursday that its net profit in the second quarter of this year was 106 million pesos, up 31 percent from the first quarter of this year.
The company said in a news release that net profits for the first half of the year reached 186 million pesos without providing comparative figures.
The company said sales volumes rose 37 percent in the second quarter versus the first quarter of this year, with export volumes accounting for 20 percent of total production.
Overall sales were up 27 percent in Q2 versus Q1 to 1.081 billion pesos, the company said.
Sales over the first six months of the year reached 1.931 billion pesos, a drop of six percent in real terms from the first half of 1996, the company said.
Operating profits in the second quarter totalled 190 million pesos, up 73 percent from the first quarter in real terms, the company said.
